```{r}
students %>% 
  filter(region == "North East", gender == "M") %>% 
  ggplot()+
  aes(x = score_in_memory_game, y = reaction_time) +
  geom_point(aes(colour = as.factor(ageyears))) +
  labs(x = "\nMemory game score",
       y = "Reaction time",
       colour = "Age")
```
